javacsw.services.cs.akka

Class JConfigServiceFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • javacsw.services.cs.akka.JConfigServiceFactory

  • public class JConfigServiceFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides factory methods for accessing the config service.

      Returns a blocking client for accessing the config service
      static JBlockingConfigServiceClient getBlockingConfigServiceClient(akka.actor.ActorSystem system, akka.util.Timeout timeout)
      Looks up the default running config service with the location service and, if found, returns a blocking client for accessing it.
      static JBlockingConfigServiceClient getBlockingConfigServiceClient(java.lang.String name, akka.actor.ActorSystem system, akka.util.Timeout timeout)
      Looks up a running config service by name with the location service and, if found, returns a blocking client for accessing it.

      Returns a non-blocking client for accessing the config service

      Looks up the default running config service by name with the location service and, if found, returns a non-blocking client for accessing it.
      static JConfigServiceClient getConfigServiceClient(java.lang.String name, akka.actor.ActorSystem system, akka.util.Timeout timeout)
      Looks up a running config service by name with the location service and, if found, returns a non-blocking client for accessing it.

    • Method Detail

      • getConfigServiceClient

        public static JConfigServiceClient getConfigServiceClient(akka.actor.ActorRef configServiceActor,
                                                          akka.actor.ActorSystem system,
                                                          akka.util.Timeout timeout)
        Returns a non-blocking client for accessing the config service
        Parameters:
        configServiceActor - the config service actor to use (May need to look up with the location service)
        system - the akka actor system
        timeout - amount of time to wait for replies from the config service actor
        Returns:
        a Java-friendly client for the config service

      • getConfigServiceClient

        public static JConfigServiceClient getConfigServiceClient(java.lang.String name,
                                                          akka.actor.ActorSystem system,
                                                          akka.util.Timeout timeout)
                                                   throws java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException,
                                                          java.lang.InterruptedException
        Looks up a running config service by name with the location service and, if found, returns a non-blocking client for accessing it.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the config service actor to use (used to look up with the location service)
        system - the akka actor system
        timeout - amount of time to wait for replies from the config service actor
        Returns:
        a Java-friendly client for the config service
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • getBlockingConfigServiceClient

        public static JBlockingConfigServiceClient getBlockingConfigServiceClient(java.lang.String name,
                                                                          akka.actor.ActorSystem system,
                                                                          akka.util.Timeout timeout)
                                                                   throws java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException,
                                                                          java.lang.InterruptedException
        Looks up a running config service by name with the location service and, if found, returns a blocking client for accessing it.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the config service actor to use (used to look up with the location service)
        system - the akka actor system
        timeout - amount of time to wait for replies from the config service actor
        Returns:
        a Java-friendly, blocking client for the config service
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
